content: [2025 | Age 22] [TextBlock(text="As I pack up my life in Japan, I can't help but reflect on how this place has reshaped my understanding of technology. Here, tech isn't just about innovation; it's about harmony with tradition, creating a balance that I'll carry with me to NYC. The journey from Kyoto's temples to Manhattan's skyscrapers is more than just a physical move—it's a shift in my tech philosophy. Time to integrate this wisdom into the next chapter.", type='text')]
